item.description:
Alexandra is graciously & enterprisingly asking various Meet Up
Groups, including ours, to meet her at the Conn.
Renaissance Faire.

Please e-mail separately Alexandra for more information about this
Activity including for her cell phone # if necessary.
(Please do not leave cell phone # at this site.
Send it in individual e-mails.
I do have her cell # from a different groups
RSVP. Again, do not to post cell # here.)

Alexandra will be at the front gate where they sell the tickets
Between 10:45 & 11:00. If you arrive later than that,
Please make arraignments beforehand directly with
Alexandra. I will have the meet up time later than that,
But it is okay to go earlier to meet Alexandra.

Going back in time to 1525.
Entering the Village of Caer Leon
In the presence of King Arthur,
His Knights of the Round Table &
Camelot.

Hebron Lions Fairgrounds
Route 85
347 Gilead Street
Hebron, CT 06248

www.ctfaire.com/connecticut_renaissance_festival/index.php

hebronharvestfair.org/History.html

www.renaissancefestival.com/viewEvent.asp?eventID=221

www.courant.com/news/local/ec/hc-4brf0927_2.artsep27,0,1513129.story

Tickets cost $15 for adults, $12 for seniors, $6 for children 5 to 12 & free for children under 5.

The fair runs four straight weekends on Saturdays & Sundays from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. through Oct. 21.

FROM HARTFORD
Take I 84 E towards East Hartford. Cross Conn River, take exit number 55, Rte 2 East towards Norwich/New London. Take exit number 13 (Rte 66). Turn LEFT Rte 66 & follow to the light several miles down the road. At the light take a left onto Rte 85. Lions Fairgrounds will be on the LEFT.

FROM NEW HAVEN
Take I- 91 Nth towards Hartford. Take EXIT 25, merging onto Rte 3 N towards Glastonbury. Merge onto Rte 2 East towards Colchester/Norwich. Take exit number 13 (Rte 66). Turn LEFT Rte 66 and follow to the light several miles down the road. At the light take a left onto Rte 85. Lions Fairgrounds will be on the LEFT.

FROM NEW LONDON
Take Rte 85 Nth towards Hartford. Turn LEFT onto Rte 82/East Haddam Rd. Take Rte 11 North towards Hartford/ Colchester. Merge with Rte 2 West. Take the Rte 16 exit, exit number 18, towards Colchester / Middletown. Take a RIGHT onto Rte 16 East. Take a LEFT onto Rte 85 North. Follow Rte 85 Nth across Rte 85 and Rte 66 intersection. Lions Fairgrounds will be on the LEFT.

FROM PUTNAM
Take I 395 Sth to Exit 91 (Rte 6 W). Follow Rte 6 W to Rte 66 W (Willimantic). Follow Rte 66 W to Hebron CT. Turn right on 66 W to Rte 85. Follow signs to Hebron Fairgrounds on Left about 3 miles down road.

Due to the very short notice, I will allow Maybes on the day of the event.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: King Arthur visits Hebron Lions Faire
